author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Cache the jthis pointer inside of the delegate C++ objects.
(dispose): Remove the need to explicitly provide jthis.
(dispose): Remove the need for an explicit jthis.
Don't pass the jthis to dispose().
(findCppAddrForJObject): Set the jthis pointer for this JNI method invocation.
(dispose): Use the cached jthis, rather than an explicit one.

author: dkulp
msg: Change the nmr defaults to match the default smx configs that are normally picked up.

author: julianfoad
msg: (tables of differences): Split the 'external' columns into
'external (file)' and 'external (dir)'. Fill in a few more rows.

author: rmuir
msg: LUCENE-2598: factor the behavior of MockRAMDirectory into MockDirectoryWrapper, add experimental -Dtests.directory= to allow running the tests under different directory impls [but the default is still RAMDirectory]
